name: Letter One
notes:
EMAIL CONTENT English: Hi {$first_name} {$last_name}, Recently, you came in for One-on-One counseling. This letter is a follow-up to see if you are working on your action plan. Our mission is to make sure you stay on the right track to meet your goals. Please contact me to discuss your progress and to determine if additional counseling is needed at this time. If we do not hear from you, your file is subject to closure. I can be reached at {$direct_line} or click here to respond. Spanish: Hola {$first_name} {$last_name},
Recientemente, usted vino para la consejeria individual o privada. Esta carta es un seguimiento para verificar si usted esta trabajando con su plan de accion. Nuestra mision es asegurarnos que se mantenga en el carril correcto para alcanzar sus metas. Favor de comunicarse conmigo para discutir su progreso y para determinar si hace falta consejeria adicional en este momento. Si no responde, su expediente sera cerrado. Se puede comunicar conmigo al {$direct_line} u oprima aqui para responder. TEXT CONTENT EN: HANDS - Recently we had a counseling session with you. Please contact your HANDS counselor for follow up using this link: {$planCLink}   ES: HANDS - Recientemente tuvimos una sesion de consejeria con usted. Favor de comunicarse con su consejero de HANDS para seguimiento utilizando este enlace: {$planCLink}

name: AP Auto Flow Companion
notes:
These QA or else are to complement the flowchart for this application.
#####################################################

=  Will (should) the action of the client (such as an uploaded file) show in the CC history of messages?
20170831: it is important to realize that: 1. there is nothing in the "chat" section of  Plan C related to AP, directly.  2: in CH are registered "only" the item what will interrupt 6030 (billable item) 3: that AP UI LH all  event/action from the AP environment will be recorded. (dev: we talked about event driven login function)

= Will the same action plan ever be attended by the same client a second time? Likely not, but it is a possibility

= Is there a standard billable amount of time for any AB or will they each be different? Probably standard, but need to look into further. PAB: in the current context and scope, billable has only meaning as a trigger or disruptive event. e.g. 6030.
20170831: let's get this answered by Amanda and put in a reference task.

= Flowchart: Has File
At this section, even  if AB does not require a doc upload, to give that give that option to client. Or decide to have a general upload in Plan C

= Sidebar: functionality for delayed docs (mail), where they be part of a queue of expected docs.

= RE: the "not now" option for client upload. If we do want to ping them as a follow up to ask if they are "ready to upload now?" we need to create a new flowchart to cover all the options. Ask Paul

20170831:  simplest approach is at the AB level, to come up with what constitute a complete AB and consider all the parts (request, doc, etc..), e.g. be self contained.  That way the system at large does not have to bother itself with detail about AB.

name: Ch APPT F2F disabled billable checkbox
Ch Auto Draft Notes
notes:
================== Specs =======================
Draft implementation when adding a new note:
    if one or more character is typed in the description, and the note type was not selected,  we auto save on exit.
    if the counselor has not set a type, this note will be saved and show as type "draft"
    any "draft" type will show a dashboard of the "author" of the note.
    the author will also have an option to delete the draft, but this does not prevent a different author to create a note.
    in CH, if there is a previous draft, no new note can be added. The draft will open onload.
    if the author selects, on a now draft, a note type which has predefined text, the predefined text will be appended to what was already typed. 
    if the user created a new note, selects a type, write content but do not save:
        we override the type, and save the note as draft.
    if the user comes back on a saved draft, edit the content,  and leaves again:
        we keep saving the content, and the note type as draft
    if the user comes back on a saved draft, edit the content "or" select a type and leaves again:
        we override the type with "draft' type and save the content if that one has changed.

When editing previously saved notes:  
    if they leave an unsaved existed note, we ask them if they want to save - done. 
    RE: https://app.asana.com/0/inbox/23510325566564/1200871523163026/1200921047624536

name: Ch New Note type: Reschedule
notes:
We need a new note type called "Rescheduled".

    It can only be selected on a note already set to either APT F2F or APT Call
    When the note is set to that new type, it cannot alter the date or time.
    On submit it must detect that the note text as change as it will be a requirement for the counselor to explain why it was resolve.
    If a change in the text is not detected, the onsubmit text will be:
        "You must supply a reason for the reschedule. It is important to understand if the client missed their appt or requested a reschedule."

#################################
Purpose:
Give a way to tell CMS to not automatically void a given Cr.   When an Appt is missed and the client want to reschedule, or is believed to want to, the counselor set the appointment note to Rescheduled, which tells the system: "don't void this, we are working at rescheduling" and then proceed to reschedule the in t

"Rescheduled" mean both in the process of being, or being.  

Again a way to prevent unwanted Void.

Reversely, the counselor can leave the Cr unchanged, except confirming in  a note why the appt did not take place, and the Cr will automatically Void after a certain period of time.


#################################

name: Ch Reschedule / To Be Reschedule Process
notes:
Note: Spec below assumes that the change of an Appt Phone to Rescheduled will be done only - starting March 8, 2021 - from the Self Checking UI - Please see "Caveat" below for exception.

As well with the APPT F2F checkin, we will make sure that before HANDS resume F2F counseling (not at least 4 months)

Extra UI behavior on top of https://app.asana.com/0/455611946112906/1122611123483788 - does change the latter.

    Unattended appt: 
        If phone APPT then no phone counseling after that appt.
        If F2F APPT then no F2F note type after that appt
        Neither Voided nor Fulfilled
    If counselor needs to reschedule appt then s/he can edit the that appointment note type and change the date and time  to new date and time.
            On submitting:
                System automatically updates the current note type to "rescheduled" and appends predefined generic description.
                    Description appended in rescheduled: "This appt has been rescheduled to {$date of new appt}.
                 System creates new appt note of same note type with new date & time
     If appt date is passed
            Label Overriding at listing: APPT F2F or APPT PHONE to "To be rescheduled"
    {we need to allow to switch APT F2F / APT PHONE}

Note:
The above applies to both physical and virtual appointment and with both new and follow-up client.
If an appt is passed, or need to be rescheduled, it can only be from the older appt. e.g. no two new appt can be schedule in a row.

name: Document Counselor late
notes:
Research the entire counselor late mechanism and document initially in a simple narrative of logic and included files and process.  later we'll determine if we need flowcharts and/or more.

-------------------------- Documentation --------------------------------

Cron job runs every day at 11:00 PM that processes (If it is working day)

a. Collect Activity Logs
b. Collect Late comers
c. Process Idle Hours


Collect Late comers:
Check counselors activities between Day start time and day start time + 15 minutes (Report time)
Collect those counselors which do not have activities between this period
then check for holidays related stuff

- Not Working time (Holiday)
- counselor is part day holiday latecomer
- if part day holiday latecomer then is end time during lunch time? look for late arrival after lunch end

After all above holidays stuff, finds counselor late comers then 

a. send email notification
b. Log Late arrival
c. Inactive Counselor ( if late arrival count increases from counselor_activity.late_arrivals.max_number which is 5 REF: application.ini)


Override: http://cflhands/admin_counselor-activity/view-late-arrivals
Here at this interface we can override the late comer log entry. Override = 1 (Yes) means exclude this log entry from late coming count. 
On Override, an email is being sent to counselor_activity.late_arrivals.override_emails (jill@cflhands.org).

EMAIL CONTENT: 
{ADMIN NAME} modified {COUNSELOR NAME} late arrival {DATE} log item.
Override is currently checked/unchecked for this item.
Comment:<?= $comment?>




-----------------------------Documentation for Developer--------------------------------

CRON JOBS: cli/_counselorsActivity.php - Every Day: 11:00 PM

Model = \application\models\CounselorActivity.php

$counselorActivityModel->generateReport();

If today is working day then process the:
a. Collect Activity Logs
b. Collect Late comers
c. Process Idle Hours


a. Collect Activity Logs:
Collect counselor activity logs from counselor_urls_log table for current day and log collected results to the counselor_activity_log table

b. Collect Late comers: 
>> \application\models\CounselorActivity.php
Function _collectLatecomers

>> application.ini 
Settings and values for:
listed all the working days start time, lunch time, end time etc..
counselor_activity.reporting_period_length = 15
counselor_activity.late_arrivals.max_number = 5


First Period end time: day start time + 15

Check Activities between periods ( Day start time 8:30 + Reporting period length 15 minutes)
If any counselor does not have any activity between that period then check for Holidays
>> Is not working time (Holiday)
>> counselor is part day holiday latecomer
>> if part day holiday end time is during lunch time, look for late arrival after lunch end

If finds counselor late then 

a. send notification - (Seems late count times in email is wrong)
b. Late arrival log
c. In Active Counselor if late arrival count increases from counselor_activity.late_arrivals.max_number = 5 (application.ini)


Override: https://housingcounseling.org/admin_counselor-activity/view-late-arrivals
Here at this interface we can override the late comer log entry. Override = 1 (Yes) means exclude this log entry from late coming count. 
On Override, an email is being sent to counselor_activity.late_arrivals.override_emails (jill@cflhands.org).

EMAIL CONTENT: 
{ADMIN NAME} modified {COUNSELOR NAME} late arrival {DATE} log item.
Override is currently checked/unchecked for this item.

        general.php (1118) - getAmiRow ($familySize)
    AMI:
        ami = ceil (income/median-income)*100
        general.php (1131) - getAmiPercent($income, $familySize)

------------------------------------------------------------
function getAmiPercent( $income, $family_size){
	$result = 1;
	if($income > 2 && $family_size > 0 && $family_size < 9) $result = ceil(($income / getAmiRow($family_size)) * 100);

	return $result;
}


Ceil Function:
ceil() PHP function converts decimal to integer value.
Like  (15 decimal places, after 15 decimal places it gets truncated)
ceil(5.0000000000001) = 6 
ceil (5.00) = 5

name: Ch Appt Release Time
notes:
Use Case:
Prior to the appt, the client calls the counselor, say they can't come to their appt, but do not know when they can come back.

Solution:
The counselor now has the ability, while they are waiting for that appt to be rescheduled, to release that time, so they can schedule another person in that time slot.


Logic of display and mechasims within CMS scope:
    Future appts
        Display release time checkbox (On/Off)
    Old appts
        Stop displaying release time checkbox (On/Off)
    Counselor busy
        Counselor should allow to add entry at counselor busy screen at the appt time if appt is set to released (checked)
    Appt Conflict
        Allow counselors to schedule another client at the time of appt if that appt is set to released (checked).
    Appointment Screen 
        Display Released label where appt time is released.

name: Cr Follow-up Appts. - Too Early - Too Late
notes:
Counselors are making Follow-up Appts in the future.  We need to think how this will affect 60/30 automation AND make sure clients are still getting letters (required of auditing.)  Admin. is suggesting a Too Early date of not less than 60 days before a 2nd appointment is set, and a Too Late date of not more than an appt. 60 days out. 

Example  for Too Early:  If client had first appt. with Counselor on March 1, the 2nd appt. couldn't be before May 1 (giving client time to produce Action Item completion.)  Exclusions to this could be:  1) Session 1 does not finish completely - client had to return to work etc. or 2) Mortgage Default counseling type.  These may need action prior to 60 days.  

Then for the Example of Too Late:  That same March 1 counseled appt. could not be given a Follow-up Appt. of July 1 - that is farther out than 60 days.  Remember our HUD rule is client follow-up within 90 days - so always want to stay on the 60 day side of that to allow time to get in touch with client.

Review with staff - then enlist Paul to put some preventions or pop-ups in CMS  
    Too early: "This appt. is within 60 days and should not be unless written circumstance is noted"
        {if within 60 days of active}
    Too late: "Pick an earlier date.  This appt. is not allowed to be set farther out than 75 days" 
        {if attempt to set date 75 days or later after Active}

name: Cr SMS validation link
notes:
Spec: 
    Send resend email confirmation link to user cell.
    When user click and hits landing page:
        If Email not validated:
            Send email link give message: [Message 1]
        If Email confirming
            Give message that link was sent and give link to support contact form [Message 2]
        If Email validated
            Give message:[Message 3]
        If Cr Hold gets expired (We expire the Cr hold request after 7 days)
            Give message: [Message 4]


Message 1
EN: Please check your email, a validation link was sent.
ES: Favor de revisar en su correo electronico el enlace que le enviamos. 

Message 2
EN: Please check your email, a validation link was already sent. If you cannot find it, please report the problem by Clicking Here {/contact/request/r/support} 
ES: Favor de revisar el enlace que enviamos a su correo electronico para que lo confirme.  Si no lo puede localizar, puede reportar el problema oprimiendo aqui: {/contact/request/r/support} 

Message 3
EN: Your email is already validated, thank you.
ES: Su correo electronico ya ha sido confirmado. Gracias. 

Message 4
EN: Sorry, this link has expired. Would you believe this being error, please report the problem by Clicking Here {/contact/request/r/support} 
ES:  Lo sentimos. Este enlace ya ha expirado. Si piensa que hay algun error favor de reportarlo oprimiendo aqui {/contact/request/r/support} 


Test Suite: 
    Create Crs in Spanish and English DONE
        Use your email and cell number
        Set text pref and cell# 
    Do not complete the registration by clicking the email validation link in your email DONE
    Next day, cron job will send you text on your cell# with resend validation link TRUE
    Click on that link, it should send you validation email again. On landing page of that link, you should find above Message 1 in Cr selected language. TRUE
    Now again click on that resend link in text message, it should not send validation email this time and should show Message 2 on the landing page TRUE
    Now go to inbox and validate the email and complete the registration DONE
    After validating the email and completing the registration, click the resend validation link again in text message, it should show you Message 3. TRUE
    To test message 4, we need to wait for 7 days. Any Cr in hold will expire after 7 days. So try clicking on any Cr resend validation link in text after 7 days (incomplete Cr registration), it should show you message 4 on landing page. TRUE

name: AP Automation Statistics
Cr 6030 Query
notes:
We need to provide a query that would tell us, for a given period of time (let's say the last 12 months for now), how many Fulfilled Cr have had one or more 6030 letter sent to them.

The idea is to be able to determine what is the ratio Cr which performed perfectly (without the help of 6030, e.g. 6030 never got trigged) versus those Cr which required some help from 6030
############ CR FULFILLED
Queries: 
    Query to find Crs having one or more letter sent based on letter sent date (since 1st Jan 2020): 
        Select count(distinct(wf.id)) from web_forms wf INNER JOIN `ch_letters_log` AS `chl` ON wf.id = chl.id_web_forms WHERE wf.status_id IN (4,5,6) AND chl.letter_id IN (1,2,3) AND DATE(chl.sent_date) > '2020-01-01';
        +------------------------+
        | count(distinct(wf.id)) |
        +------------------------+
        |                    462 |
        +------------------------+
        [all active: 557]
    Query to find Crs having one or more letter sent based on CH fulfilled date ( since 1st Jan 2020): 
        Select count(distinct(wf.id)) from web_forms wf INNER JOIN `ch_letters_log` AS `chl` ON wf.id = chl.id_web_forms WHERE wf.status_id = 6 AND chl.letter_id IN (1,2,3) AND DATE(wf.fulfilled_date)> '2020-01-01';
        +------------------------+
        | count(distinct(wf.id)) |
        +------------------------+
        |                    587 |
        +------------------------+
        [all active: 588]
    Letter wise count query: select chl.letter_id as Letter, count(wf.id) as Count from web_forms wf INNER JOIN `ch_letters_log` AS `chl` ON wf.id = chl.id_web_forms WHERE wf.status_id = 6 AND chl.letter_id IN (1,2,3) AND DATE(chl.sent_date) > '2020-01-01' group by chl.letter_id;
    +--------+-------+
    | Letter | Count |

name: SMS Alerts how to tell bounced numbers
notes:
Is there a way to see SMS logs and determine how many bounces?

######### Possible statuses ##################

Accepted: indicating that Twilio accepts the request and will soon determine the optimal 'From' phone number for the message
Delivered: Twilio has received confirmation of message delivery from the upstream carrier, and, where available, the destination handset.
Failed: The upstream provider did not accept the message and hence delivery fails.
Queued: indicating your request to send a message was successful and the message is queued to be sent out.
Received:  indicating the message was received by one of your Twilio numbers.
Sent: Once the nearest upstream carrier has accepted the message for delivery to the SMS network, the status is updated to sent.
Undelivered: Twilio has received a delivery receipt indicating that the message was not delivered. This can happen for a number of reasons including carrier content filtering, availability of the destination handset, etc.


Undelivered: 57 (Unknown destination handset. The destination number you are trying to reach is unknown and may no longer exist.) since 2015
Failed: 11  (Account suspended. Your account was suspended between the time of message send and delivery. Please contact Twilio.)

--------------------------------------------------------------
- SMS callback status
- API callback returns phone number + status
if status = undelivered then search phone number in web_forms and update mobile field/status (either we can add a new field for mobile status)

notes:

#######################
At. 5;30PM on 6/10 HANDS received our non-recommendation letter from Orange County about our $244,000 One-on-One counseling grant, so per HANDS' Board guidance, all private counseling to Orange County (not City of Orlando) clients is now omitted from HANDS' services (at least for the time being until Orange County partners with some funding.)

As of Sat. 6/11, we have one client in PENDING 171905 who we cannot serve.

Please assist in discussing a HOLD or block for these clients.

IMPORTANT:  As of 9:00PM on Friday when I read the email, I requested a contact at Orange County to whom our clients can call for FREE counseling services.  I hope to give you that information soon.
